languages.text: "Да ты, Пропащий, никак свою стаю потерял?" {n}У молодого Волка оказывается сильный и дерзкий голос, богатый обертонами. Он насмешливо склоняет голову, наблюдая за тем, как лицо Ульфара сравнивается в цвете с его волосами.{/n}

"You haven't lost your pack, have you, Everlost?" {n}The young Wolf's voice is strong and insolent, and richly melodic. He tilts his head in mocking concern, watching Ulfar's complexion change to match the violent shade of his hair.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да ты, Пропащий, никак свою стаю потерял?" {n}У молодого Волка оказывается сильный и дерзкий голос, богатый обертонами. Он насмешливо склоняет голову, наблюдая за тем, как лицо Ульфара сравнивается в цвете с его волосами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You haven't lost your pack, have you, Everlost?" {n}The young Wolf's voice is strong and insolent, and richly melodic. He tilts his head in mocking concern, watching Ulfar's complexion change to match the violent shade of his hair.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

traits.locale_text: "You haven't lost your pack, have you, Everlost?" {n}The young Wolf's voice is strong and insolent, and richly melodic. He tilts his head in mocking concern, watching Ulfar's complexion change to match the violent shade of his hair.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: “你该不会是和你的狼群失散了吧，迷途之人？”{n}这位年轻的太空野狼声音既有力、又傲慢，说话的语气抑扬顿挫。他仰起了头，露出了嘲弄的神色，挑衅地看着乌尔法的脸色涨得像他的头发一样红。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You haven't lost your pack, have you, Everlost?" {n}The young Wolf's voice is strong and insolent, and richly melodic. He tilts his head in mocking concern, watching Ulfar's complexion change to match the violent shade of his hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你该不会是和你的狼群失散了吧，迷途之人？”{n}这位年轻的太空野狼声音既有力、又傲慢，说话的语气抑扬顿挫。他仰起了头，露出了嘲弄的神色，挑衅地看着乌尔法的脸色涨得像他的头发一样红。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: 「お前の群れは残ってないのか、どうなんだ、エバーロストよ？」{n}若い狼の声は強気かつ威圧的でありながらも実に美しい響きがある。心配するふりをして小首をかしげ、ウルファーの態度が己の鮮烈な髪色と似合いのものに変わっていく様子を眺めている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You haven't lost your pack, have you, Everlost?" {n}The young Wolf's voice is strong and insolent, and richly melodic. He tilts his head in mocking concern, watching Ulfar's complexion change to match the violent shade of his hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前の群れは残ってないのか、どうなんだ、エバーロストよ？」{n}若い狼の声は強気かつ威圧的でありながらも実に美しい響きがある。心配するふりをして小首をかしげ、ウルファーの態度が己の鮮烈な髪色と似合いのものに変わっていく様子を眺めている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: «No habrás perdido a tu manada, ¿eh, Perdido?». {n}La voz del Lobo joven es fuerte e insolente, pero profusamente melódica. Ladea la cabeza con una preocupación mordaz, observando cómo la tez de Ulfar adquiere el mismo tono llamativo de su cabellera.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You haven't lost your pack, have you, Everlost?" {n}The young Wolf's voice is strong and insolent, and richly melodic. He tilts his head in mocking concern, watching Ulfar's complexion change to match the violent shade of his hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No habrás perdido a tu manada, ¿eh, Perdido?». {n}La voz del Lobo joven es fuerte e insolente, pero profusamente melódica. Ladea la cabeza con una preocupación mordaz, observando cómo la tez de Ulfar adquiere el mismo tono llamativo de su cabellera.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: « Tu n'as tout de même pas perdu ta meute, Égaré ? » {n}demande le jeune Loup insolent d'une voix à la fois forte et mélodique, en feignant l'inquiétude tandis que le teint d'Ulfar s'accorde peu à peu à la couleur de ses cheveux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You haven't lost your pack, have you, Everlost?" {n}The young Wolf's voice is strong and insolent, and richly melodic. He tilts his head in mocking concern, watching Ulfar's complexion change to match the violent shade of his hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tu n'as tout de même pas perdu ta meute, Égaré ? » {n}demande le jeune Loup insolent d'une voix à la fois forte et mélodique, en feignant l'inquiétude tandis que le teint d'Ulfar s'accorde peu à peu à la couleur de ses cheveux.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Ihr habt doch nicht etwa Euer Rudel verloren, oder, Siegtnie?" {n}Die Stimme des jungen Wolf ist fest, dreist und überaus melodisch. Er neigt seinen Kopf in spöttischer Fürsorge und beobachtet, wie Ulfars Haut den gewalttätigen Ton seiner Haare annimmt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You haven't lost your pack, have you, Everlost?" {n}The young Wolf's voice is strong and insolent, and richly melodic. He tilts his head in mocking concern, watching Ulfar's complexion change to match the violent shade of his hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt doch nicht etwa Euer Rudel verloren, oder, Siegtnie?" {n}Die Stimme des jungen Wolf ist fest, dreist und überaus melodisch. Er neigt seinen Kopf in spöttischer Fürsorge und beobachtet, wie Ulfars Haut den gewalttätigen Ton seiner Haare annimmt.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Sürünü kaybetmedin değil mi Hepgaip?" {n}Genç Kurt'un sesi; güçlü, küstah ve melodik. Dalga geçercesine başını endişeyle eğiyor, Ulfar'ın benzinin saç rengine dönüşmesini izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You haven't lost your pack, have you, Everlost?" {n}The young Wolf's voice is strong and insolent, and richly melodic. He tilts his head in mocking concern, watching Ulfar's complexion change to match the violent shade of his hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sürünü kaybetmedin değil mi Hepgaip?" {n}Genç Kurt'un sesi güçlü, küstah ve melodik. Dalga geçercesine başını endişeyle eğiyor, Ulfar'ın benzinin saç rengine dönüşmesini izliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC
